pr_title: Deprecated support for delaying state recovery pending master nodes

timeline.message: Deprecated support for delaying state recovery pending master nodes

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                The number of (data or master) nodes that are expected to be in the cluster.
          
          
            
                deprecated:[7.7.0, This setting will be removed in 8.0. You should use `gateway.expected_data_nodes` instead.]
          
          
            
                The number of (data or master) nodes that are expected to be in the cluster.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,12 +13,14 @@ recover the cluster state and the cluster's data:
     The number of (data or master) nodes that are expected to be in the cluster.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                The number of master nodes that are expected to be in the cluster.
          
          
            
                deprecated:[7.7.0, This setting will be removed in 8.0. You should use `gateway.expected_data_nodes` instead.]
          
          
            
                The number of master nodes that are expected to be in the cluster.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,12 +13,14 @@ recover the cluster state and the cluster's data:
     The number of (data or master) nodes that are expected to be in the cluster.
     Recovery of local shards will start as soon as the expected number of
     nodes have joined the cluster. Defaults to `0`
+    Deprecated and will be removed in 8.0
 
 `gateway.expected_master_nodes`::
 
     The number of master nodes that are expected to be in the cluster.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                Recover as long as this many data or master nodes have joined the cluster.
          
          
            
                deprecated:[7.7.0, This setting will be removed in 8.0. You should use `gateway.recover_after_data_nodes` instead.]
          
          
            
                Recover as long as this many data or master nodes have joined the cluster.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,10 +40,12 @@ as long as the following conditions are met:
 `gateway.recover_after_nodes`::
 
     Recover as long as this many data or master nodes have joined the cluster.
